CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...6. The Best Foodds Company booth featured a "Let's Eat Outside Basket." Arch Gibson is one of the local representatives...-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Arch Gibson standing in The Best Foods Inc. booth in the Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
